data.title: Love the coneys!
data.text: My mom took us to the arcade market to get coneys before it was at the current location because her father would take her there on the trips to Canton when she was a little girl. The coneys are really good and the steamed buns make them even better. You can purchase the coney sauce in bulk to make your own coneys at home. The sauce can also be frozen.

data.title: Best coneys around!
data.text: Stop in for a great lunchtime treat! The famous Arcade coney is the best in town! A legend in its own rite, the hotdogs are tasty and the coney sauce is second to none! Lots of Canton history behind this culinary treat...

data.title: A Canton tradition
data.text: Great coneys and the recipe has been passed down from the original owners. You can eat outside or at small tables inside.
